Package com.strongholds.game.net

Class TcpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strongholds.game.net.TcpServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INetworkController, java.lang.Runnable
    public class TcpServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements INetworkController
    Simple Tcp server. It asynchronously sends and receives request from a host.
